trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of security available to a service endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os tipos de segurança disponível para um ponto final de serviço configurado para receber pedidos de HTTP.

trans-unit.source: WebHttpSecurity provides the security requirements for an endpoint configured with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: WebHttpSecurity fornece os requisitos de segurança para um ponto final configurado com um <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>especificado pelo valor o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>método, em seguida, as definições fornecidas pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>propriedade entram em vigor para o ponto final de serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>só pode ser definido <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>construtor que assuma-lo como um parâmetro explícito e o respetivo valor não não possível definir novamente depois de criar a instância de enlace.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode of security that is used by an endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de segurança que seja utilizado por um ponto final configurado para receber pedidos HTTP com um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property becomes effective.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade determina se as definições do <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>propriedade entrar em vigor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref> that indicates whether transport-level security or no security is used by an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Um valor da <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref> que indica se a segurança ao nível do transporte ou nenhum segurança é utilizada por um ponto final.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor não é um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*> property has changed from its default and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>propriedade foi alterado de predefinido e devem ser serializada.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: This is used for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Isto é utilizado para a integração de XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>valor da propriedade deve ser serializada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the Transport property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se a propriedade de transporte foi alterado de valor predefinido e deverá ser serializada.

trans-unit.source: This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
trans-unit.target: Isto é utilizado pelo WCF para integração com o XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*>valor da propriedade deve ser serializada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains the transport-level security settings for this binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que contém as definições de segurança de nível de transporte para este enlace.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> object returned by this property to set the transport security parameters for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>objeto devolvido por esta propriedade para definir os parâmetros de segurança de transporte para <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the Transport property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>especificado pelo valor o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>método, em seguida, as definições fornecidas pela propriedade transporte entram em vigor para o ponto final de serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> value is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> method, then the settings provided by the Transport property become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>especificado pelo valor o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29>método, em seguida, as definições fornecidas pela propriedade transporte entram em vigor para o ponto final de serviço.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> can only be set in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> constructor that takes it as an explicit parameter and its value cannot be set again after the binding instance is created.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>só pode ser definido <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>construtor que assuma-lo como um parâmetro explícito e o respetivo valor não não possível definir novamente depois de criar a instância de enlace.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity> for this binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>para este enlace.</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The default values set are a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType*> of <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType*> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"></xref>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*> = "".
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de valores predefinidos são uma <> </> *> de <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>, um <> </> *> de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"> </xref>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*>= "".</xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm*> </xref:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType>
